page.name: The Burning Gem
page.description: This staff is strangely warm to the touch. It's topped by a magical gem that is larger than your fist.

properties.name: The Burning Gem
properties.description: This staff is strangely warm to the touch. It's topped by a magical gem that is larger than your fist.

page.name: The Root of All Sneevil
page.description: Find the lair of the box stealing thieves and recover the lost treasure!

properties.name: The Root of All Sneevil
properties.description: Find the lair of the box stealing thieves and recover the lost treasure!
properties.complete: You have made your way though the sneevil forest, defeating the thieving box-snatchers at every turn, and you didn't even get poison ivy!

page.name: Enchanted Grove
page.description: A place for wishes and secrets, for madness and dreams.

properties.name: Enchanted Grove
properties.description: A place for wishes and secrets, for madness and dreams.
properties.complete: A place for wishes and secrets, for madness and dreams.

page.name: Sneevil Box Fort
page.description: This is the sneevils base of operations for the surrounding area. It seems to be built almost entirely out of the remnants of broken containers.

properties.name: Sneevil Box Fort
properties.description: This is the sneevils base of operations for the surrounding area. It seems to be built almost entirely out of the remnants of broken containers.
properties.complete: You have defeated the regional Sneevil Box Lord. On your adventure you learned more about the Sneevils and their goals in the area.

page.name: Sir Koffagus Sarcophagus
page.description: The undead knight Sir Koffagus has fallen to you in battle. As a reward he has let you take a weapon from his horde.

properties.name: Sir Koffagus Sarcophagus
properties.description: The undead knight Sir Koffagus has fallen to you in battle. As a reward he has let you take a weapon from his horde.
properties.complete: The undead knight Sir Koffagus has fallen to you in battle. As a reward he has let you take a weapon from his horde.

page.name: The Keep Invasion
page.description: Oaklore Keep has been invaded by a force of sneaky sneevils! They seem to be after one of two Ironwood Boxes that were delivered to the Knights of the Pactogonal Table, but which is the real chest?

properties.name: The Keep Invasion
properties.description: Oaklore Keep has been invaded by a force of sneaky sneevils! They seem to be after one of two Ironwood Boxes that were delivered to the Knights of the Pactogonal Table, but which is the real chest?
properties.complete: You saved the tower but Sneevil ninajs escaped with the real Ironwood Box, and you were left with the DECOY BOX!  It looks like you will have to get it back from the King Splurt himself!

page.name: Sneevil-Jitsu Dojo
page.description: You have come directly to the home of the Sneevil Ninja Army to find out about their plans to attack Oaklore keep.

properties.name: Sneevil-Jitsu Dojo
properties.description: You have come directly to the home of the Sneevil Ninja Army to find out about their plans to attack Oaklore keep.
properties.complete: Shogun Snizix confessed his plans to invade Oaklore Keep in a daring daylight attack and added, laughing: "You too late, human! Sneevil Ninja attack is already happenings! The Kings will haves his SPECIAL BOX!". Quick! To the Keep!

page.name: Sneevil Boxopolis
page.description: The sneevils stole an Ironwood Box intended for the Knights of Oaklore Keep when they invaded. You must enter their Boxopolis high in the trees of Oaklore forest and retrieve the box.

properties.name: Sneevil Boxopolis
properties.description: The sneevils stole an Ironwood Box intended for the Knights of Oaklore Keep when they invaded. You must enter their Boxopolis high in the trees of Oaklore forest and retrieve the box.
properties.complete: It turns out that King Splurt had no interest in the contents of the box, but simply in the box itself. However, you taught them a valuable lesson about taking things that do not belong to them.
